<<<<<<< HEAD
A catechism for the use of His Royal Highness, the Prince of Wales Anderdon, Christopher.
[12], 96 p.
To be sold at Thomas Moette ..., At Paris : 1692.
The prayers (p. 25-96) have parallel text in English and Latin. Signed: C.A., S.J. Written by Christopher S.J. Anderdon. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd. ed.). Title page vignette. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
=======

[12], 96 p.
To be sold at Thomas Moette ..., At Paris : 1692.
The prayers (p. 25-96) have parallel text in English and Latin. Signed: C.A., S.J. Written by Christopher S.J. Anderdon. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd. ed.). Title page vignette. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Thomas Moette
